name: Dual Laser Cannon (V)
Lore: 'Sund x2-100 laser cannon. Popular among outlaw organizations because it is both cheap and powerful. Frequently mounted on T-47 airspeeders.',
Text: 'Deploy on your T-47. May target a character or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Character hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +2 > defense value. Vehicle hit if destiny +X > defense value, where X = T-47 pilot''s ability (maximum 5).',
